step_feedback.feedback: Good job starting in a comfortable position and stretching your arm overhead. Keep that arm straight and feel the stretch.
Excellent! You're opening your palm and fingers wide. Remember to keep your arm extended overhead.
Great fist and muscle tightening as you inhale. Ensure you're really squeezing those muscles.
Well done opening your hand and relaxing as you exhale. Visualize the fluid moving.
Good start for the second rep, keeping your arm straight overhead and feeling the resistance.
Nice wide hand and finger opening. Continue to focus on maintaining that overhead arm position.
You're making a good fist and tightening muscles while inhaling. Keep up the strong effort.
Excellent exhale and relaxation with an open hand. You're doing great visualizing the lymph flow.

exercise_summary: You're doing a great job with the overhead pumping exercise! Remember to keep your arm straight overhead and feel the stretch. Make sure to open your hand wide and tighten your muscles as you inhale, then relax as you exhale.
